original: 「雖說取漢上之地，易如反掌。但我主躬行仁義，不忍奪同宗基業。現暫時屯兵江夏，也是別有良策，非尋常人能夠明白的。」
text: "Although it is easy to take the land in the Han Dynasty. But my lord does justice and cannot bear to seize the inheritance of the same clan. It is also a good plan for the temporary army of Jiangxia, which extraordinary people can understand."
